titleStmt.title: A miscellany of sundry essayes, paradoxes, and problematicall discourses, letters and characters; together with politicall deductions from the history of the Earl of Essex, executed under Queen Elizabeth. / By Francis Osborn Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Francis, 1593-1659.

notesStmt.note: "Conjecturall queres" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb:"; The '9' in imprint is crossed out and replaced with "8-9".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
